name: A2C:Ayry seems to be playtesting a 2D runner shooter from Cci(Prologue demo)
name_original: A2C:Ayry seems to be playtesting a 2D runner shooter from Cci(Prologue demo)
description:
Instruction:

Shoot things

Dodge bullets

Have fun!

Features:
  • 2D runner shump gameplay where you shoot and dodge and shoot and dodge.
  • Its a runner but its also a shoot-em up!
  • You are forced to run forward but you can control how fast you want to go.
  • C00L backgrounds.
  • RGB Bullets.
  • A lot of RGB bullets.
  • Bullet time mechanic to help you against the swarm of RGB bullets.
  • Created (mostly) by one person.
  • Sorry, no dogs yet.
  • Wonderful soundtrack from Rengoku Teien(煉獄庭園) and other composers.
  • Game comes with free music ❎
  • Music comes with free game ✅
  • A kill counter for score chasers!(with numbers that will go up pretty fast)
  • A timer for speed runners!(despite going fast at the game basically comes down to holding down the right key)
  • Around 15 minutes of gameplay in the demo iirc.
Controls:

Hold left click/Mouse 1 to fire and shoot

Press right click/Mouse 2 to activate slow motion

Press spacebar/W to jump

Press A/D to move left/right

Press S to slide

Press Esc at any time to return to main menu
